titleStmt.title: The truly blessed man, or, The way to be happy here, and forever being the substance of divers sermons preached on Psalm XXXII / by Samuel Willard.
titleStmt.author: Willard, Samuel, 1640-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Green and J. Allen for Michael Perry,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained, tightly bound, and torn, with loss of print. Pages 259-266 torn. Pages 259-267 of second defective Harvard University Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
